article: lewis `` scooter '' libby , vice president dick cheney 's chief of staff and a key architect of the iraq war , was indicted friday on felony charges of perjury , making false statements to fbi agents and obstruction of justice for impeding the federal grand jury investigating the cia leak case .
abstract: cheney aide resigns faces # counts in cia identity leak
